text: Klays nɨkɨm ne sogek God binɨb suŋtep ne mɨdobun. Pen ne kumɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop pɨsnep dek kɨm amel, tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal ak tɨg walɨg gɨyokup. Tap si tap tɨmel anɨb okok, takaw ag adek nokom lak ned yek ñɨn ak gɨpal. Pen Klays ne anɨgak ak nɨm, takaw ag adek nokom lak kɨdeyɨl ak wos gek, ne bɨ nab nɨb ak mɨdeb. Anɨb ak binɨb God kɨlop suk agɨl aglek nop nɨŋɨd kɨdek gɨpal okok, God bɨlel agak, Ñapay yad okok kɨlop gek pel pelnep yenɨgabal agak ak, kɨli takaw anɨb ak dɨnɨgabal. Takaw anɨb ak, God ne nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebin agɨl anɨb agak, Kɨli pel pelnep yenɨgabal agak.
